ComicInfo.Summary:
Zenescope is proud to present this advance exclusive sneak peek that includes full script, layouts, and pencils to ESCAPE FROM WONDERLAND #1 as well as the script for issue #0. This special issue is a must-have for any serious fan of Zenescope Entertainment's Wonderland trilogy. Featuring a wraparound sketch cover by Eric Basaldua and a special introduction on how the final part of the trilogy was outlined and created.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-29 15:54:03. [CVDB456165]
